metadata.title: CVE-2021-30533 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in PopupBlocker in Google Chrome prior to91.0.4472.77 allowed a remote attacker to bypass navigation restrictionsvia a crafted iframe.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
